com.chbase

Class ApplicationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chbase.ApplicationConfig

  • public class ApplicationConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Application Config is a simple configurator backed by a properties file. There are several helper values for well known configurations. Additional values may be retrieved too.
